title: RH Jumps as Market Share Gains Offer Hope After Earnings Miss
description: Luxury furniture retailer RH soared after it reported higher growth than rivals as the industry contends with pressure from tariffs and a sluggish housing market.
content: Luxury furniture retailer RH soared after it reported higher growth than rivals as the industry contends with pressure from tariffs and a sluggish housing market.
